details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.12 Permissions - Digest keys
details.description: If DocMDP is present, then the Signature References dictionary (ISO 32000-1:2008, 12.8.1, Table 253) shall not contain the keys DigestLocation, DigestMethod, and DigestValue.

rule.description: If DocMDP is present, then the Signature References dictionary (ISO 32000-1:2008, 12.8.1, Table 253) shall not contain the keys DigestLocation, DigestMethod, and DigestValue.
rule.test: permsContainDocMDP == false || entries.split('&').filter(elem => elem == 'DigestLocation' || elem == 'DigestMethod' || elem == 'DigestValue').length == 0

error.message: The Signature References dictionary contains %1 key(s) in presence of DocMDP entry in the permissions dictionary.
